database.name: VIEW SSWH_RPT_ORDER_PENDING
database.view: SELECT a.dateordered, h.value AS bpartner_id, h.name AS bpartner_name, i.name AS document_type, a.c_order_id, g.documentno AS order_document, a.dateinvoiced, b.c_invoice_id, f.documentno AS invoice_document, c.value AS product_id, c.name AS product_name, d.value AS warehouse_id, d.name AS warehouse_name, e.name AS uom, a.qtyordered, a.qtyreserved, a.qtydelivered, a.qtyinvoiced, CASE WHEN a.qtydelivered > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS isdelivered, CASE WHEN a.qtyinvoiced > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS isinvoiced, i.docbasetype, g.docstatus, mi.documentno AS noguia, g.poreference AS pororden FROM c_order g JOIN c_orderline a ON a.c_order_id = g.c_order_id JOIN m_product c ON a.m_product_id = c.m_product_id JOIN m_warehouse d ON a.m_warehouse_id = d.m_warehouse_id JOIN c_uom e ON a.c_uom_id = e.c_uom_id JOIN c_bpartner h ON g.c_bpartner_id = h.c_bpartner_id JOIN m_inoutline mil ON a.c_orderline_id = mil.c_orderline_id JOIN m_inout mi ON mil.m_inout_id = mi.m_inout_id LEFT JOIN c_invoiceline b ON a.c_orderline_id = b.c_orderline_id LEFT JOIN c_invoice f ON b.c_invoice_id = f.c_invoice_id LEFT JOIN c_doctype i ON g.c_doctype_id = i.c_doctype_id OR g.c_doctypetarget_id = i.c_doctype_id WHERE c.producttype = 'I' AND g.docstatus <> 'CL' AND i.docbasetype = 'SOO'
